org.springframework.integration.mqtt.inbound

Class AbstractMqttMessageDrivenChannelAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.context.IntegrationObjectSupport
      • org.springframework.integration.endpoint.AbstractEndpoint
        • org.springframework.integration.endpoint.MessageProducerSupport
          • org.springframework.integration.mqtt.inbound.AbstractMqttMessageDrivenChannelAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aware, BeanFactoryAware, BeanNameAware, DisposableBean, InitializingBean, SmartInitializingSingleton, ApplicationContextAware, Lifecycle, Phased, SmartLifecycle, ExpressionCapable, MessageProducer, NamedComponent, TrackableComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MqttPahoMessageDrivenChannelAdapter

    @ManagedResource
 @IntegrationManagedResource
public abstract class AbstractMqttMessageDrivenChannelAdapter
extends MessageProducerSupport
    Abstract class for MQTT Message-Driven Channel Adapters.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Gary Russell, Artem Bilan

public void addTopic(String... topic)
